name: ['mTurquoise']
description: ['enhanced monomeric variant of CFP (Goedhart et al., 2010)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['mTurquoise2']
description: ['enhanced monomeric variant of CFP (Goedhart et al., 2012)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['mVenus']
description: ['Venus YFP with monomerizing A206K mutation (Nagai et al., 2002)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['mCerulean']
description: ['enhanced monomeric variant of CFP (Rizzo et al., 2004)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['mTFP1']
description: ['monomeric teal (cyan) fluorescent protein (Ai et al., 2006)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['mWasabi']
description: ['green variant of teal fluorescent protein mTFP1 (Ai et al., 2008)']

name: ['Clover']
description: ['bright green-yellow fluorescent protein derived from GFP (Lam et al., 2012)']

name: ['mClover2']
description: ['monomeric derivative of the bright green-yellow fluorescent protein Clover']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['mClover3']
description: ['bright green-yellow fluorescent protein derived from mClover2, with improved photostability (Bajar et al., 2003)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['hrGFP']
description: ['humanized Renilla green fluorescent protein']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['LanYFP']
description: ['tetrameric yellow fluorescent protein from Branchiostoma lanceolatum, also known as blFP-Y3']

name: ['mNeonGreen']
description: ['bright monomeric yellow-green fluorescent protein derived from LanYFP (Shaner et al., 2013)']

name: ['LSSmOrange']
description: ['monomeric orange fluorescent protein with a large Stokes shift (Shcherbakova et al., 2012)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['Slow-FT']
description: ['blue-to-red fluorescent timer derivative of mCherry (Subach et al., 2009)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['Medium-FT']
description: ['blue-to-red fluorescent timer derivative of mCherry (Subach et al., 2009)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['Fast-FT']
description: ['blue-to-red fluorescent timer derivative of mCherry (Subach et al., 2009)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['PSmOrange']
description: ['orange to far-red photoswitchable variant of the monomeric fluorescent protein mOrange (Subach et al., 2011)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['PSmOrange2']
description: ['enhanced orange to far-red photoswitchable monomeric fluorescent protein (Subach et al., 2012)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['PA-GFP']
description: ['photoactivatable GFP variant (Patterson et al., 2002)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['rsEGFP']
description: ['reversibly switchable enhanced green fluorescent protein (Grotjohann et al., 2011)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['rsEGFP2']
description: ['reversibly and rapidly switchable enhanced green fluorescent protein (Grotjohann et al., 2012)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['Kohinoor']
description: ['fast-switching photoswitchable fluorescent protein useful for fluorescence nanoscopy (Tiwari et al., 2015)']

name: ['EosFP']
description: ['green-to-red photoswitchable fluorescent protein (Wiedenmann et al., 2004)']

name: ['mEos2']
description: ['monomeric variant of green-to-red photoswitchable fluorescent protein EosFP (McKinney et al., 2009)']

name: ['mEos3.2']
description: ['improved monomeric variant of green-to-red photoswitchable fluorescent protein EosFP (Zhang et al., 2012)']

name: ['mEos4a']
description: ['fixation-resistant green-to-red photoswitchable fluorescent protein (Paez-Segala et al., 2015)']['derived from mEos2']

name: ['mEos4b']
description: ['fixation-resistant truly monomeric green-to-red photoswitchable fluorescent protein (Paez-Segala et al., 2015)']['derived from mEos2']

name: ['mClavGR2']
description: ['monomeric photoconvertible green-to-red fluorescent protein derived from Clavularia cyan FP (Hoi et al., 2010)']

name: ['mMaple']
description: ['monomeric photoconvertible green-to-red fluorescent protein derived from mClavGR2 (McEvoy et al., 2012)']

name: ['rsTagRFP']
description: ['TagRFP derivative with reversibly photoswitchable absorbance (Subach et al., 2010)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['daGFP']
description: ['green fluorescent protein with peak excitation at 510 nm and peak emission at 521 nm']

name: ['iRFP713']
description: ['phytochrome-based near-infrared fluorescent protein, originally termed iRFP (Filonov et al., 2011)']['name was changed to iRFP713 (Shcherbakova and Verkhusha, 2013)']

name: ['iRFP670']
description: ['near-infrared fluorescent protein with an emission peak at 670 nm, engineered from a bacterial phytochrome (Shcherbakova and Verkhusha, 2013)']['derived from Rhodopseudomonas palustris RpBphP6']

name: ['iRFP682']
description: ['near-infrared fluorescent protein with an emission peak at 682 nm, engineered from a bacterial phytochrome (Shcherbakova and Verkhusha, 2013)']['derived from Rhodopseudomonas palustris RpBphP2']

name: ['iRFP702']
description: ['near-infrared fluorescent protein with an emission peak at 702 nm, engineered from a bacterial phytochrome (Shcherbakova and Verkhusha, 2013)']['derived from Rhodopseudomonas palustris RpBphP6']

name: ['iRFP720']
description: ['near-infrared fluorescent protein with an emission peak at 720 nm, engineered from a bacterial phytochrome (Shcherbakova and Verkhusha, 2013)']['derived from Rhodopseudomonas palustris RpBphP2']

name: ['miRFP670', 'ORF frame 1']
description: ['bright monomeric near-infrared fluorescent protein engineered from a bacterial phytochrome, with an emission maximum of 670 nm (Shcherbakova et al., 2016)']

name: ['miRFP703', 'ORF frame 1']
description: ['bright monomeric near-infrared fluorescent protein engineered from a bacterial phytochrome, with an emission maximum of 703 nm (Shcherbakova et al., 2016)']

name: ['miRFP709', 'ORF frame 1']
description: ['bright monomeric near-infrared fluorescent protein engineered from a bacterial phytochrome, with an emission maximum of 709 nm (Shcherbakova et al., 2016)']

name: ['IFP1.1']
description: ['bacteriophytochrome-based infrared fluorescent protein (Shu et al., 2009)']

name: ['IFP1.4']
description: ['bacteriophytochrome-based monomeric infrared fluorescent protein (Shu et al., 2009)']

name: ['IFP2.0']
description: ['bacteriophytochrome-based monomeric infrared fluorescent protein (Yu et al., 2014)']

name: ['mIFP']
description: ['naturally monomeric infrared fluorescent protein derived from a truncated bacteriophytochrome (Yu et al., 2015)']

name: ['smURFP']
description: ['dimeric small ultra-red fluorescent protein derived from a cyanobacterial phycobiliprotein (Rodriguez et al., 2016)']

name: ['TDsmURFP']
description: ['monomeric tandem dimer of a small ultra-red fluorescent protein derived from a cyanobacterial phycobiliprotein (Rodriguez et al., 2016)']

name: ['pHuji']
description: ['pH-sensitive red fluorescent protein derived from mApple, for imaging of exocytosis and endocytosis (Shen et al., 2014)']['mammalian codon-optimized']

name: ['ratiometric pHluorin']
description: ['pH-sensitive mutant of green fluorescent protein (Miesenbock et al., 1998)']['responds to a drop in pH with a reversible decrease in excitation at 395 nm and a corresponding increase in excitation at 475 nm']
